item.title: Man who stabbed teenage tourists at iconic NYC train station gets 26 years in prison

item.title: EPA eliminates research and development office, begins layoffs
item.description: The Environmental Protection Agency said Friday it is eliminating its research and development arm and reducing agency staff by thousands of employees
